thread.title: Ivory Coast coach releases 20-man squad to face Ghana in CHAN qualifier
thread.title_full: Ivory Coast coach releases 20-man squad to face Ghana in CHAN qualifier

title: Ivory Coast coach releases 20-man squad to face Ghana in CHAN qualifier
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 14:25 CET Ivory Coast coach releases 20-man squad to face Ghana in CHAN qualifier - www.ghanasoccernet.com Local Elephants 
Ivory Coast coach Michel Dussuyer has selected a strong 20-man squad to face Ghana on Sunday in the 2016 CHAN final qualifying round first leg tie in Kumasi. 
The Frenchman's troops is dominated by five players from ASEC Mimosas who finished runners-up in the Ivorian Ligue 1. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us BUT A SMILE ON YOUR FACE TO FACE A SMLIE AND LEAVE THOSE TEMPORAL PROBLEMS ASIDE. By: FRANCIS TAWIAH ,
